Description: Bowl (sherd.base); glazed pottery; painted in black and cobalt on white with a lion(?) and flowers.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester (?)
Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie (?)
Donated through: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Acquisition notes: Paper note accompanying object: "Fragments of pottery from Egypt. Given to A.W.F. by Flinders Petrie & Greville Chester.1885".
